Samuel Dedetoku nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ Sam Dede (a mụrụ na 17 Nọvemba 1965) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye nkuzi. A na-ahụta ya dịka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị baa ọgaranya na ndị kachasị nwee mmetụta na Naịjirịa
Ọ pụtara na ihe karịrị ihe nkiri 350 ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ nkwado na ọrụ karịrị afọ iri abụọ. Sam Dede si Rivers State, Nigeria
A na-akpọ ya "Ebube" maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Issakaba
A mụrụ Sam Dede n'abalị 17 ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1965 na Lagos wee kwaga Sapele.
Ọ banyere ụlọ ọrụ Nollywood n'afọ 1995 wee bụrụ onye a ma ama maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Ijele

N'afọ 2005, Dede meriri Africa Movie Academy Award for Best Actor in a Supporting Role maka arụmọrụ ya na ihe nkiri 2004 The Mayors A kwanyeere ya ugwu na SVAFF 2014 Special Recognition Award maka ihe ọ rụzuru na ndụ ya na onyinye ya na sinima Naịjirịa
A họpụtara ya maka Africa Movie Academy Award for Best Actor in a Leading Role n'afọ 2018 maka arụmọrụ ya na ihe nkiri 2017 In My Country

A họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke Rivers State Tourism Development Agency n'afọ 2012 ma jee ozi n'ọkwa ahụ obere oge. Ọ bụkwa onye nkuzi na Mahadum Port Harcourt na-akụziri ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-amalite amalite. Otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ ya, Yul Edochie gara n'ihu bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Nollywood. Otú ọ dị, o kwuru n'afọ 2012 na ọ gaghị akwụsị ime ihe nkiri maka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị.
